overview: It is approaching Valentine's Day and the disturbed Lawrence is infatuated with Lily, who has no idea that Lawrence exists. After assembling an unsettling yet creative valentine's card for her, upon delivery Lawrence discovers that Lily is already in a relationship with golden boy Felix. Lawrence then seeks to wreak vengeance on the couple as his mental state further declines
tagline: A heartfelt gift is not always a good thing.
title: Unrequited
